document_data.mainbody: '''Radish''' was a hardy root vegetable (a fielding),{{Cite dragon/277/The New Adventures of Volo: Dragonwing Stew|94}} grown and consumed in many areas of the Realms.
document_data.Usage:
*The [[Blackthorn's Brew]] inn in the city of [[Velen]] served a dish called the [[Sixroots Salad]] – a collection of [[butter]]-fried root vegetables and [[rock crab]]s, garnished with carved radishes.
*Radishes were used in preparation of specialty [[greens-platter]]s at the [[Old Wheel]] in the caravan city of [[Crimmor]]. These cold [[bean]] and radish salads were served in a crust of blackrind [[cheese]].{{Cite dragon/334/Crimmor: City of Caravans|30}}
*[[The High Helm]] festhall in [[Juniril]], a town in Cormyr, offered a cold platter of [[saltfish]], [[cheese]], and radishes at any time of the day for mere 3 [[cp|coppers]].

Some believed that radishes possessed medicinal properties to purify blood and liver.
document_data.Significance: *There existed a halfling superstition that if you plant row of [[turnip]]s or radishes and burry a circular stone underneath, the goddess [[Yondalla]] would send you "big fellers."
